Avenco

Avenco is built by dreamers for dreamers.
Embrace your ideal morning with Avenco.

settings.custom_html: You may also like

settings.heading: Choose the right mattress
settings.subheading:
We have four series of mattresses, namely silence mattress, zone mattress, starry mattress, original mattress,
we will guide you to choose the mattress that suits you.
settings.section8: Which Mattress is Best For Me？

settings.title: Twin Size Mattress
settings.text:
Twin Size Mattress is good choice for children room, apartments or guest bedrooms. College dorm rooms and suitable for smaller bedrooms or if you will be moving frequently.

And it can also be the perfect size for a guest-bed, daybed or bunk-bed, it's one of the most popular options for mattress size.

settings.title: Twin XL Size Mattress
settings.text:
Best for taller teenagers, college dorm rooms or shared adult bedrooms.

With an extra 5 inches longer, Twin XL offer more room to stretch out, while making it a great choice for your growing tall kids. It’s also a common size in college dormitories.

Also, it's ideal for couples to use on a split adjustable base, combine two Twin XL you will get a dimension closer to a King.

settings.title: Full Size Mattress
settings.text:
Best for Teenagers, a single person with a dog.

A full-size bed sometimes called a double mattress, but it’s really only enough for a single sleeper, not recommend for couples. A full is a great choice for growing child and guest rooms.

If you are looking for more space, you can consider a queen bed, which gives a more comfortable place when there are two peoples on the bed.

settings.title: Queen Size Mattress
settings.text:
Best for couple who like to cuddle and sleep tight together.

The extra inches added by queen size can make a big difference in comfort. Today, especially for couples, queen size mattress has become the most popular mattress size.

A queen mattress is also a good choice for a single sleeper who enjoy plenty of space, especially teenager who like to stretch.

settings.title: King Size Mattress
settings.text:
Best for a family with children and pets.

Measuring 76" wide and 80" long, the king is about twice the width of the twin size. It provides plenty of space for a couple to sleep comfortably. To ensure that the king-size mattress will fit nicely into your bedroom, check your room dimensions.

Given their large dimensions, king-size beds are more difficult to move or transport, however, Avenco bed in a box makes it easy!

settings.title: California King Mattress
settings.text:
Best for taller couples who want a luxurious amount of space.

California king is actually smaller in width than king-size; however, it has 4 inches longer than king size. A California king mattress fits best in a spacious master bedroom, which is large enough to accommodate couples who share the bed with their children and pets.

Its generous length makes it ideal for taller individuals, especially people more than six feet tall.

settings.title:
Mattress Dimensions:
Which bed size is right for you?
settings.description:
It is hard to decide which size you need ? 
We would like to offer the size  guide to you pickup the right size to open up a restful life of sleeping.

settings.title: Which Bed Size Is The Best For Me?
settings.text:
When choosing a brand-new mattress, we understand that our honored customers may excited or hesitant. This is a normal psychological emotion because the mattress is not a fast consumer product. A comfortable mattress can improve your sleep health and quality.

Thus, before purchasing a mattress, our experts suggest you consider the following questions:
settings.button_label: 1. Who is going to sleep on this mattress？

settings.title: What is a single mattress?
settings.answer: A twin-size mattress and a single mattress are the same mattress size, it is the smallest bed size on the mattress market, measuring 39 inches wide and 75 inches long.

settings.title: What is the smallest bed size on the market?
settings.answer: A single mattress (twin-size) is the smallest mattress size on the market.

settings.title: What is the biggest mattress size?
settings.answer: Avenco has six different mattress size and California king is the largest bed size, measuring 72 inches wide and 84 inches long.

settings.title: What is the difference between a king-size mattress and a California King size mattress?
settings.answer: A king mattress is measuring 76 * 80 inches while a California king mattress is measuring 72 * 84 inches. Thus, compared to a king mattress, a California king mattress is 4 inches longer than a king mattress, but a king mattress is 4 inches wider than a California king mattress.

settings.title: What is the widest mattress?
settings.answer: The king mattress is the widest mattress product in Avenco, measuring 76" wide.

settings.title: What is the longest mattress?
settings.answer: The California king mattress is the longest mattress product in Avenco, measuring 80" long.

settings.title: How big is a queen-size mattress?
settings.answer: A queen-size mattress is the most popular mattress on the U.S. market. It measures 60 inches wide by 80 inches long.

settings.title: How height are the mattresses?
settings.answer: In Avenco, we provide two thickness options to our valued customers, which are 10-inches and 12-inches. Either innerspring hybrid or memory foam mattress can choose two thickness sizes, but there will be a difference in price.

settings.title: How can the mattress match with the bed frame?
settings.answer: Normally, a mattress and a bed frame should be the same size so that the product can exert its comfort and stability.

settings.title: How to measure a mattress?
settings.answer:
First, please remove all sheets, bedspreads, and pillows from the mattress.

Second, measure the width from the left to the right of the mattress.

Third, to get the length, measure the mattress from head to foot.

settings.title: How to ensure the Avenco mattress can be moved into the bedroom?
settings.answer: Don’t worry. Our Avenco mattress delivery by “mattress in a box”. Our Avenco mattress is compressed into a small box so that couriers can easily and quickly deliver it to your house.

settings.title: Is there a mattress smaller than a twin?
settings.answer: There are six sizes available in Avenco mattresses, that is Twin, Twin XL, Full, Queen, King, Cal King. We don’t have a mattress smaller than a Twin.

settings.title: What size is a double mattress?
settings.answer: A full-size bed sometimes called a double mattress, measuring 54” width x 75” long.

settings.title: Is a full bed big enough for two?
settings.answer: The full-size mattress, measuring 54” wide and 75’’ long. Also known as a double mattress. It is just 15 inches wider than a twin size. A full mattress is a tight fit for two, not much space for comfortable sleep, thus not recommended for two adults.

settings.title:
Which Bed Size Is
The Best For Me?
Which bed size is the best for me
settings.text:
When choosing a brand-new mattress, we understand that our honored customers may excited or hesitant. This is a normal psychological emotion because the mattress is not a fast consumer product. A comfortable mattress can improve your sleep health and quality.

Thus, before purchasing a mattress, our experts suggest you consider the following questions:
settings.faqq1: Who is going to sleep on this mattress?
settings.faqa1:
There are six sizes and two thicknesses options for Avenco mattress. Thus, you need to consider who is going to sleep on the bed. Normally,

Twin-size or Twin XL-size --- Children and bunk beds used.

Twin XL-size or Full-size --- Teenagers and dormitory used.

Queen-size --- Single adults or couples.

King-size or California-size --- Families with babies or pets
settings.faqa2: Before buying a mattress, we suggest our customers to consider their body size. Please add 7.8 inches (20 cm) to your height as the best size, it can leave room for your body to stretch.
settings.faqa3: The price position of Avenco mattress takes care of different consumer groups, ranging from a minimum price of $397 to a maximum price of $696.
settings.faqa4: The size of your bed depends on how big your bedroom is. From the perspective of interior design, the area of the bed is very important to the overall effect of the bedroom. The bed is too large or too small will affect the beauty and use of the bedroom.
settings.faqq5: What kind of mattress do you need?
settings.faqa5:
People with different sleeping positions and posture may have their preferences for the softness and hardness of the mattress.

The firmness guide for Avenco silence memory foam mattress: medium to plush.

The firmness guide for Avenco zone hybrid mattress: medium to firm.

settings.title: Avenco Silence Memory Foam Mattress
settings.text: For a memory foam mattress, it’s soft and supportive, it can comfort your body. The double airflow wave shape layers of this memory foam beds provide better ventilation, which helps to relief your body pressure and adjust sleep temperature in this all-foam mattress type. Also it provides lower motion transfer than innerspring mattresses because there are no coils shifting when your partner moves during sleep.
settings.text_mobile:
Comfort to your body
Provide better ventilation
Relieve pressure points
Adjust sleep temperature
No motion transfer
A silence sleep

settings.title: Avenco Zone Hybrid Mattress
settings.text: Our hybrid mattress is made by the right balance of softness and support, using both foam and spring technologies to create a superior sleep surface. The upgraded 5 zones independent pocketed innerspring design with edge support ensures that your body weight is evenly absorbed and distributed comprehensively from head to toe throughout the mattress. It also provides the targeted support to your body, proper back support & alignment. No worry about slipping off the bed.
settings.text_mobile:
Perfect support & comfort
Upgrade 5 zones design
Independent pocket innerspring
Proper back support & alignment
Great edge support system
Zone optimal sleep

settings.title: What's the difference between mattress types?

settings.feature_text: Double airflow wave shape foam relieves pressure points and conforms to your body, supportive without sink into the mattress.
Specially designed 5 Zones distribution by the individual pocket coil spring, offering a peaceful sleep without disturb.
With foam added on the corner, it provides better edge support and body contouring, enjoys a full night sleep.
The latest technology of special shape foam can provide you suitable firmness of the head and the tail of the bed.

settings.heading: Up to 24% off on Mattress
settings.subheading: Don't miss out on this chance!
settings.bundle: New Release - Avenco New Launch Mattresses

settings.title: Compare Avenco Mattresses
settings.text: We have four series of mattresses, namely silence mattress, zone mattress, starry mattress, original mattress. What is the difference? We would like to give a guide for you to choose the right mattress.

settings.title: Mattress Size Guide
settings.text: Choosing a suitable mattress size is one of the key steps to improve your sleeping quality. Among these sizes, is it hard to decide which size you need? We would like to offer the size guide to help you pick up the right size to open up a restful life of sleeping.

settings.title: Guide to Buying Mattress
settings.text: With so many options available online, it can be quite confusing how to choose the right mattress. We will discuss all the important points or factors and guide you on how to choose a mattress efficiently.

settings.title: What kind of mattress do I need ?
settings.answer: There are different types of mattresses for each type of person. To know which mattress will be ideal for you, you need to understand your personal preferences. If you prefer a soft mattress you can consider memory foam type, wise versa, you canpick a hybrid mattress if you prefer great support.

settings.title: What type of mattress is best for a heavy person?
settings.answer: Sometimes it's difficult for larger people to find a mattress that is supportive andcomfortable enough. Our Zone mattress and Original Hybrid mattress is specially designed for an overweight person. Excellent support without sacrificing sleepcomfort.

settings.title: What mattress is best for lower back pain?
settings.answer: Our Zone Mattress is a medium-firm feeling, which is very suitable for back sleepers. It has enough support to maintain the correct body alignment, but soft enough to maintain comfort.

settings.title: What is the best mattress for side sleepers?
settings.answer: Avenco Silence Mattress is designed for side sleepers in particular. The comfort layer ofmemory foam reduces pressure points and keeps the spine aligned, there by reducing shoulder and back pain.

settings.title: What firmness mattress do I need?
settings.answer:
Firmness is atricky topic. This is because firmness is highly subjective. After all, what is"plush" or "firm" for me? Everyone has a different view anddefinition of the meaning of these words according to their perception, understanding, and desire. We want to help sleepers find the ideal firmness.

Our mattresses firmness as below for reference: (From 1 to 10, 10 is plush)

Zone 10’’Hybrid Mattress: 4.5 Firm.

Zone 12’’Hybrid Mattress: 4 Medium - Firm

Original HybridMattress: 4.5 Firm

Silence 10’’Memory Foam Mattress: 7 Medium - Plush

Silence 12’’Memory Foam Mattress: 7.5 Plush

Starry 10’’Memory Foam Mattress: 5 or 7 (Head & Tail)

Starry 14’’Memory Foam Mattress: 6 to 8 (adjustable)

settings.title: What mattress size is right for me?
settings.answer:
To choose the right mattress size, you should consider how big your bedroom is and whether it is shared with a partner, child, or pet.

Our most popular pick is queen size mattress and full mattresses are an ideal choice for adults and guest room. Twin mattresses can use for children's room and the Twin XL mattress is more suitable for university dorm students, or you can combine two Twin XL you will get a dimension closer to a King.

For those family use, with partners, pets, or children, theKing or California King is recommended. Still cannot decide? Please check our mattress size guide.

settings.top_content: To further improve the sleeping experience of different types of sleepers, this Zone Mattress is divided into 5 areas to provide necessary spinal support. In other words, it can ensure that your spine will not bend into an unnatural shape while sleeping.
settings.tab_1_textcontent:
Excellent support with plush comfort Individual pocket coil slring a peaceful sleeping environment without disturb and different flexibility coil makes this mattress 5 zones disturbing to better adapt every part of your body.

Excellent support with plush comfort Individual pocket coil slring a peaceful sleeping environment without disturb and different flexibility coil makes this mattress 5 zones disturbing to better adapt every part of your body.
settings.tab_1_layerheader: See how the Avenco Zone Hybrid Mattress stacks up
settings.tab_1_layer1_text1: 1、First layer. Gel-infused ventilated memory foam creates a plush and cool sleeping surface for a more restful night's sleep. This layer reduces sweat and perspiration during hot or humid weather.
settings.tab_1_layer1_text2: 2. Cool foam. With next-generation cooling technology, the surface of the mattress is well ventilated and has a temperature self-regulation function. The thin filling layer of cooling gel keeps you refreshed all night.
settings.tab_1_layer1_text3: 3. Premium high-density foam. High-density premium foam relieves the pressure of your shoulder, back, and hips and conforms to your body, sleep comfortably. Perfectly adapted to every point of your body. Keep your spine aligned while eliminating pressure points.
settings.tab_1_layer1_text4: 5. 5-Zone Individual Pocket Spring. The upgraded 5 zones independent pocketed innerspring design with edge support ensures that your body weight is evenly absorbed and distributed comprehensively from head to toe throughout the mattress.
settings.tab_1_layer1_text5:
5、Fifth layer.
Gel-infused ventilated memory foam creates a plush and cool sleeping surface for a more restful night's sleep. This layer reduces sweat and perspiration during hot or humid weather.
settings.tab_2_textcontent_1:
Spring
Head & Shoulder Support / Upper Body Comfort / Spine Support / Lower Body Comfort / Lower Legs Support

Our Zone Hybrid Mattress offers you point to point support, ensures that your body weight is evenly absorbed and distributed comprehensively from head to toe throughout the mattress.

It also provides the targeted support to your body, proper back support & alignment. Say goodbye with back pain!
settings.tab_2_textcontent_2: Each single pocket spring works independently for support and can stretch itself. Therefore, you won't get affected when the other person turns over or gets up, ensuring a whole night of undisturbed sleep.

settings.title: Ideal for all sleeping position
settings.content:
-Suitable for side sleepers and stomach sleepers. Say goodbye to Back pain.
-Committed to providing support and comfortable sleep.
-5 zones distribution to better adapt to every part of your body.

settings.text-1:
-Implanted with natural soft modal fiber yarn, the surface is well elastic and skin-friendly.

-The yarn of the fabric is snailed to make the fabric have stronger anti-static, anti-pilling, and tensile and tear resistance.
settings.text-2:
-Breath holes that allow air to escape to prevent overheating.


-Well ventilated and has a temperature self-regulation function.

-Stay cooling all night long without sweat
settings.text-3:
-Offered sleep comfort while maintaining support.


-Premium elastic memory foam for neck and back support
-Committed to creating a comfortable and consistent sleep experience.
